dct_title_s: Chart showing increase and decrease of the population of the United States, area, debt, and other statistics of the eleventh census
dct_alternative_sm: Chart showing increase and decrease of the population of the United States, area, debt, and other statistics of the eleventh census designed for Appletons' annual cyclopaedia for 1890, by T. Campbell-Copeland, Expert Special Agent ; drawn by W.A. Smith.
dct_description_sm: 1 map : col., encapsulated in Mylar ; 49 x 77 cm
Shows percent increase by state for periods 1850-1860, 1860-1870, 1870-1880, and 1880-1890.
Includes text, table showing increase for selected cities, and tables showing population, United States, 1800-1890, settled areas in sq. miles, and public debt in dollars.
Issued folded in pocket in back cover.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
